mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s1_post (user_id, subject, content, price) VALUES ( #{user.id}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{price})
mapper.sql: SELECT p.post_id "p_post_id" , p.user_id "p_user_id" , p.subject "p_subject" , p.contents "p_contents" , p.price "p_price" , p.viewCnt "p_viewCnt" , p.regDate "p_regDate" , p.status "p_status" , p.goodCnt "p_goodCnt" , p.tags "p_tags" , u.id "u_id" , u.username "u_username" , u.location "u_location" FROM s1_post p, s1_user u WHERE p.post_id = u.id
mapper.select:
SELECT p.post_id "p_post_id" , p.user_id "p_user_id" , p.subject "p_subject" , p.contents "p_contents" , p.price "p_price" , p.viewCnt "p_viewCnt" , p.regDate "p_regDate" , p.status "p_status" , p.goodCnt "p_goodCnt" , p.tags "p_tags" , u.id "u_id" , u.username "u_username" , u.location "u_location" FROM s1_post p, s1_user u
LOWER(p.subject) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY p.post_id DESC
